name: The Horror on the Walls
description:
I should never have read that damned book....

Tom Harris is an amateur archaeologist and lover of the occult and paranormal. One day he acquire a book that detailing how to perform a sinister ritual. Intrigued Tom performs it, but in the process attracts the attention of a malevolent being that transports him to its terrible and strange dimension that is a cruel reflection of our reality. Tom must find a way out before it's too late.....

Useful information :

WASD -> Move 

ESC -> In Game Menu

Q -> Inventory  

WASD + R -> RUN 

Left Shift -> Hide

Available languages:

  • Spanish
  • English

Any comments are welcome !
